scripts.build: npm install github:ruralinnovation/graphql-schemas -w @cori-risi/infrastructure && npm run build --ws
scripts.build:api: npm run build:schemas && npm run build:infra
scripts.build:infra: npm install github:ruralinnovation/graphql-schemas -w @cori-risi/infrastructure && npm run build -w @cori-risi/infrastructure
scripts.build:readme: quarto render wiki/CORI-Data-API.qmd --to gfm --output temp.md && cp wiki/temp.md README.md && rm wiki/temp.md
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w @cori-risi/graphql-schemas && npm run clean -w @cori-risi/infrastructure
scripts.dev:api: npm run build:api && npm run build:dev -w @cori-risi/graphql-schemas & npm run dev:python-lambdas & npm run start -w @cori-risi/infrastructure
scripts.prep: aws ecr-public get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin public.ecr.aws/l2v0f2h3 && docker pull public.ecr.aws/sam/build-python3.11
scripts.publish:schemas: npm run build:schemas && npm run hive-publish -w @cori-risi/graphql-schemas
scripts.start:api: echo 'For local GraphQL lambda function support, remember to first start the local Python REST api with Flask (npm run dev:python-lambdas)' & npm run start -w @cori-risi/infrastructure
scripts.synth: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run synth:pipeline -w @cori-risi/infrastructure
scripts.test:robot: cd packages/python-lambdas && cd bcat && ./tests.sh http://localhost:2000 && cd ..
